> Curiosity + Concept + Craft

I consider myself a **Thinksigner** (a deeply curious designer focused on scalable solutions, visual metaphors and the implementation of ideas through any medium, including **code**).

## üëÅ Attention Investement

The most effective way to attract the attention of a market is not by **algorithmic harassment**, but in the way of establishing **organic everlasting relationships**.

## üéØ Strategic Improvisation

Solving a communication problem is not simply **creativity**. A deadline is a threat only if there‚Äôs no **plan** that‚Äôs being executed on time.

## üß† Conceptual Analysis

An answer will not be efficient until the question has been properly explored. Questioning everything is the most attractive part of the **creative** process. I'm experienced in: Information Architecture, Brand Design, UI Design, Research, Storytelling, Desktop Publishing, Wireframing, Storyboarding and Illustration.

## üì≤ Common Sense Tech

Digital solutions are **tools** at the service of **ideas**, not the other way around. Knowing the trends that influence individual and collective decisions is not the same as subordinating yourself to them.
